result.execSummary:
Brandon L Burdick was extradited to another county, state or jurisdiction. Extradition means Brandon L Burdick was accused or convicted of an offense in another county, state or jurisdiction and was taken there to face their charge(s) or conviction.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.
result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Brandon L Burdick

defendant.name: Burdick, Brandon L
defendant.address: 121 1/2 E. Blackhawk Avenue., Apt 2, Prairie du Chien, WI 53821

records.addlTxt:
9:56 AM Call to Order by Court.  Appearances stated: Defendant Brandon L Burdick in court, in custody.  Attorney Luke Steiner appeared by video for State of Wisconsin. 

Court provides a copy of the criminal complaint of extradition,  Allamakee County, State of Iowa. 
Court informs defendant of nature of charges and penalty sections of criminal complaint for each count. Defendant states understanding. Right to counsel is explained. 

Court reviews waiver of extradition form with defendant. Defendant states understanding. 
Defendant agrees to waiver of extradition. Defendant initials complaint. 

Defendant signs waiver of extradition. 
Court finds defendants waiver of extradition has been made freely, knowingly and voluntarily. 

Court certifies and signs waiver. Court provides a copy to the defendant. Sheriffs department will contact Allamakee county to make arrangements for transfer.
